artist: Charles A. Braun; Victor M. Grab & Co.
description: double handled cauldron with 4 ribs at side; dark finish overall with copper swirls; cauldron topped with circular plate, at center is pull lever which opens coin slot; at one edge is a window inside a shield; inside window is the #15 from a counting wheel; 14 partially exposed
marks:
Inscription

under base: [VICTOR M. GRAB & CO. /
title: "Basket Bank (Smooth)" still bank
